actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to require the establishment and operation of the western regional export licensing office.
short_title: Western Regional Export Licensing Office Act of 1987

summary.text: Western Regional Export Licensing Office Act of 1987 - Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to direct the Secretary of Commerce to establish a western regional office with the authority to issue export licenses.

titles.title: Western Regional Export Licensing Office Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to require the establishment and operation of the western regional export licensing office.
